# Unity-generated folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# User-specific files
UserSettings/
*.pidb
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.unityproj
*.booproj

# Autogenerated JetBrains Rider and VS Code files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.user
*.userprefs

# Crash and temporary files
sysinfo.txt
*.stacktrace

# Builds
*.apk
*.aab
*.xcodeproj
*.xcworkspace

# Asset Store tools
[Aa]ssets/AssetStoreTools*

# Ignore cache and package folders
Packages/com.unity.package-manager/
Logs/
